title: Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The BidiUtil class in org.eclipse.swt.internal.BidiUtil contains a line of code that uses Class.forName() to create a Callback object. This line of code causes a NoClassDefFoundError when running the CLDC version of SWT.
EB: The BidiUtil class should be modified to remove the usage of reflection and avoid throwing a NoClassDefFoundError.
